lowerFpsThreshold.AltName: Lower FPS Threshold - Raise Balance Level
lowerFpsThreshold.Wiki: If it falls below this FPS, increase the load balance level by 1.

upperFpsThreshold.AltName: Upper FPS Threshold - Lower Balance Level
upperFpsThreshold.Wiki: If you exceed this FPS, lower the load balance level by 1.

lowerFpsContinousCount.AltName: Lower FPS Continous - Raise Balance Level
lowerFpsContinousCount.Wiki: If this frame continues below the threshold, level up

upperFpsContinousCount.AltName: Upper FPS Continous - Lower Balance Level
upperFpsContinousCount.Wiki: If the threshold is exceeded continuously for this frame, level down

downAfterChangeSleep.AltName: Sleep Frame Count after Level Lower
downAfterChangeSleep.Wiki: Sleep frame count after level down

upAfterChangeSleep.AltName: Sleep Frame Count after Level Raise
upAfterChangeSleep.Wiki: Sleep frame count after leveling up

postProcessMotionBlurIteration.Wiki: Reduce the number of Motion Blur iterations

sfxParticleHalf.Wiki: Emit interval, number of emits, LOD distance halved in graphics config

sfxDistortion.Wiki: Omit of distortion applied by SFX

sfxScaleRenderDistanceScale.Wiki: Scale to the distance judgment of the effect dynamically registered in the reduction buffer by the distance of SFX

shadowCascade0ResolutionHalf.Wiki: Cut the shadow (cascade 0) resolution in half

shadowCascade1ResolutionHalf.Wiki: Cut the shadow (cascade 1) resolution in half

chrWetDisablePlayer.Wiki: Turn off the water wetting process for local players

chrWetDisableRemotePlayer.Wiki: Turn off the water wetting process of the remote player

chrWetDisableEnemy.Wiki: Turn off the water wetting process of enemy characters
